title: gzip seek
body:
Please answer these questions before submitting your issue. Thanks!

### What version of Go are you using (`go version`)?
1.7


### What did you do?
I just want to code a log analyse tool. Since log files are huge , it's not possible to decompress to plain text and analyse .


### What did you expect to see?
I want to locate/seek to the position as os.open does.

### What did you see instead?
Since gzip has no seek function , I tried using seek func on os.open or say io.reader object, and send to gzip.newreader.  But when I tried to bufio.readbyte, it raised  panic runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference.
